QuestData.Title: Punish the Trespassers
QuestData.Description: We, priests of Nahom, are guardians of the Tombs of the Precursors.$B$BEver since the Neferset turned to their new masters, they've turned to great heresies.$B$BThey rob the sacred tombs of our forefathers, seeking powerful artifacts and destroying invaluable relics in the process.$B$BGo to the tombs, east of here and punish the tomb-robbers for their transgressions, lest they join their brethren when the Neferset attack on Nahom begins.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay any 10 Neferset intruders at the Tombs of the Precursors.
QuestData.CompletionText: You're back, $n. Is your prowess as great as I've heard?
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps you are as powerful as I've heard afterall.$B$BYou have our gratitude.
